templates.name: cardigann
templates.title: Cardigann
templates.description: Cardigann, a server for adding extra indexers to Sonarr, SickRage and CouchPotato via Torznab and TorrentPotato proxies. Behind the scenes Cardigann logs in and runs searches and then transforms the results into a compatible format.

templates.title: Calibre Web
templates.name: calibreweb
templates.note:
Portainer App Templates by Technorabilia based on data provided by LinuxServer.io.

Don't forget to create the volume directories on the host file system.

mkdir -p /volume1/docker/calibre-web/config
mkdir -p /volume1/docker/calibre-web/books
templates.description: [Calibre-web](https://github.com/janeczku/calibre-web) is a web app providing a clean interface for browsing, reading and downloading eBooks using an existing Calibre database. It is also possible to integrate google drive and edit metadata and your calibre library through the app itself. This software is a fork of library and licensed under the GPL v3 License.

env.name: TZ
env.label: TZ
env.description: Specify a timezone to use for example Europe/Amsterdam

env.name: DOCKER_MODS
env.label: DOCKER_MODS
env.description: #optional & **x86-64 only** Adds the ability to perform ebook conversion

env.name: OAUTHLIB_RELAX_TOKEN_SCOPE
env.label: OAUTHLIB_RELAX_TOKEN_SCOPE
env.description: Optionally set this to allow Google OAUTH to work

templates.name: changedetection
templates.title: ChangeDetection
templates.description: changedetection.io - The best and simplest self-hosted open source website change detection monitoring and notification service. An alternative to Visualping, Watchtower

templates.name: cloudcmd
templates.title: Cloud Commander
templates.description: Cloud Commander a file manager for the web with console and editor.

templates.name: couchpotato
templates.title: Couchpotato
templates.description: CouchPotato (CP) is an automatic NZB and torrent downloader. You can keep a "movies I want"-list and it will search for NZBs/torrents of these movies every X hours. Once a movie is found, it will send it to SABnzbd or download the torrent to a specified directory.

templates.name: duckdns
templates.title: DuckDNS
templates.description: Duckdns is a free service which will point a DNS (sub domains of duckdns.org) to an IP of your choice.

templates.name: duplicati
templates.title: Duplicati
templates.description: Duplicati works with standard protocols like FTP, SSH, WebDAV as well as popular services like Microsoft OneDrive, Amazon Cloud Drive & S3, Google Drive, box.com, Mega, hubiC and many others.

templates.name: duplicacy
templates.title: Duplicacy
templates.description: Duplicacy backs up your files to many cloud storages with client-side encryption and the highest level of deduplication

templates.name: dozzle
templates.title: Dozzle
templates.description: Realtime log viewer for docker containers.

templates.name: droppy
templates.title: Droppy
templates.description: Droppy is a self-hosted file storage server

templates.name: filebrowser
templates.title: Filebrowser
templates.description: filebrowser provides a file managing interface within a specified directory and it can be used to upload, delete, preview, rename and edit your files.

templates.name: filerun
templates.title: Filerun
templates.description: access your files anywhere through self-hosted secure cloud storage, file backup and sharing for your photos, videos, files and more.

templates.name: gaps
templates.title: Gaps
templates.description: Gaps searches through your Plex Server or local folders for all movies, then queries for known movies in the same collection.

templates.name: healthchecks
templates.title: Healthchecks
templates.description: Healthchecks is a watchdog for your cron jobs. It's a web server that listens for pings from your cron jobs, plus a web interface.

templates.name: heimdall
templates.title: Heimdall
templates.description: Heimdall is a way to organise all those links to your most used web sites and web applications in a simple way.

templates.name: homepage
templates.title: Homepage
templates.description: A modern (fully static, fast), secure (fully proxied), highly customizable application dashboard with integrations for more than 25 services and translations for over 15 languages. Easily configured via YAML files (or discovery via docker labels).

templates.name: jackett
templates.title: Jackett
templates.description: Jackett works as a proxy server it translates queries from apps like Sonarr etc into tracker-site-specific http queries and parses the html response sending results back to the requesting software.

templates.name: klaxon
templates.title: Klaxon
templates.description: Klaxon is a free, quick to set up and easy to use robot that checks websites regularly so you don't have to.

templates.title: Librespeed
templates.name: librespeed
templates.note:
Portainer App Templates by Technorabilia based on data provided by LinuxServer.io.

Don't forget to create the volume directories on the host file system.

mkdir -p /volume1/docker/librespeed/config
templates.description: [Librespeed](https://github.com/librespeed/speedtest) is a very lightweight Speedtest implemented in Javascript, using XMLHttpRequest and Web Workers. No Flash, No Java, No Websocket, No Bullshit.

env.name: TZ
env.label: TZ
env.description: Specify a timezone to use for example Europe/Amsterdam

env.name: PASSWORD
env.label: PASSWORD
env.description: Set the password for the results database.

env.name: CUSTOM_RESULTS
env.label: CUSTOM_RESULTS
env.description: (optional) set to `true` to enable custom results page in `/config/www/results/index.php`.

env.name: DB_TYPE
env.label: DB_TYPE
env.description: Defaults to `sqlite`, can also be set to `mysql` or `postgresql`.

env.name: DB_NAME
env.label: DB_NAME
env.description: Database name. Required for mysql and pgsql.

env.name: DB_HOSTNAME
env.label: DB_HOSTNAME
env.description: Database address. Required for mysql and pgsql.

env.name: DB_USERNAME
env.label: DB_USERNAME
env.description: Database username. Required for mysql and pgsql.

env.name: DB_PASSWORD
env.label: DB_PASSWORD
env.description: Database password. Required for mysql and pgsql.

templates.name: logzio-logs-collector
templates.title: Logzio Logs Collector
templates.description: Docker container that uses Filebeat to collect logs from other Docker containers and forward those logs to your Logz.io account.

templates.name: logzio-metrics-collector
templates.title: Logzio Metrics Collector
templates.description: Docker Metrics Collector is a container that runs Metricbeat with the modules you enable at runtime.

templates.name: mayan
templates.title: Mayan EDMS
templates.description: Mayan EDMS is an electronic vault for your documents.

templates.name: netbootxyz
templates.title: Netboot.xyz
templates.description: Netbootxyz is a way to PXE boot various operating system installers or utilities from one place within the BIOS without the need of having to go retrieve the media to run the tool

templates.name: ombi
templates.title: Ombi
templates.description: Ombi allows you to host your own Plex Request and user management system. If you are sharing your Plex server with other users, allow them to request new content using an easy to manage interface

templates.name: overseerr
templates.title: Overseerr
templates.description: Overseerr is a request management and media discovery tool built to work with your existing Plex ecosystem.

templates.name: plex
templates.title: Plex Media Server
templates.description: Plex organizes your video, music, and photo collections and streams them to all of your screens.

templates.name: plextraktsync
templates.title: PlexTraktSync
templates.description: A python script that syncs the movies, shows and ratings between trakt and Plex

templates.name: plexrequests
templates.title: Plex Requests
templates.description: Simple automated way for users to request new content for Plex.

templates.name: prowlarr
templates.title: Prowlarr
templates.description: Prowlarr is a indexer manager/proxy built on the popular arr .net/reactjs base stack to integrate with your various PVR apps. Prowlarr supports both Torrent Trackers and Usenet Indexers.

templates.name: pureftp
templates.title: Pure-FTP Server
templates.description: Pure-FTPd is a free (BSD), secure, production-quality and standard-conformant FTP server.

templates.name: radarr
templates.title: Radarr
templates.description: Radarr - A fork of Sonarr to work with movies la Couchpotato.

templates.name: readarr
templates.title: Readarr
templates.description: Readarr - Book Manager and Automation (Sonarr for Ebooks)

templates.name: rclone
templates.title: Rclone Config Backup
templates.description: Rclone is a command line program to sync files and directories to and from cloud providers (Dropbox, GDrive, Box, etc)

templates.name: resilio
templates.title: Resilio Sync
templates.description: Resilio Sync (formerly BitTorrent Sync) uses the BitTorrent protocol to sync files and folders between all of your devices. There are both free and paid versions, this container supports both.

templates.name: rutorrent
templates.title: ruTorrent
templates.description: ruTorrent is a quick and efficient BitTorrent client

templates.name: scrutiny
templates.title: Scrutiny
templates.description: WebUI for smartd S.M.A.R.T monitoring

templates.name: sickrage
templates.title: SickRage
templates.description: Automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.

templates.name: sonarr
templates.title: Sonarr
templates.description: Sonarr (formerly NZBdrone) is a PVR for usenet and bittorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available.

templates.name: syncserver
templates.title: Mozilla Syncserver
templates.description: Run-Your-Own Firefox Sync Server

templates.name: tautulli
templates.title: Tautulli
templates.description: A Python based monitoring and tracking tool for Plex Media Server.

templates.name: urlwatch
templates.title: UrlWatch
templates.description: A tool for monitoring webpages for updates

templates.name: vsftpd
templates.title: vsftpd FTP Server
templates.description: Secure, fast FTP server for UNIX-like systems

templates.name: watchtower
templates.title: Watchtower
templates.description: Automatically update running Docker containers

templates.name: wizarr
templates.title: Wizarr
templates.description: Wizarr is an advanced user invitation and management system for Jellyfin, Plex, Emby etc.
